import React, { useState, Component } from 'react' import api from '../api' import Conversations from './Conversations' import Contacts from './Contacts' import NewContact from "./NewContact"; import NewGroupe from "./NewGroupe"; import Setting from "./client/setting"; import Security from "./client/security"; class Sidebar extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { movies: [], isLoading: false, } } componentDidMount = async () => { this.setState({ isLoading: true }) await api.getAllUsers().then(users => { this.setState({ users: users.data.data, isLoading: false, }) }) } render() { const { movies, isLoading } = this.state //const id = this.props.id; const id = "fghgh"; console.log(id); console.log(movies); // [ Return ] return (
